tagline: Hire the tech & creative talent behind unforgettable events.
pitch: Discover and hire vetted technicians, creatives, and production pros — fast, reliable, bilingual.
bullets: Audio • Lighting • Video • Backline • Stage • Rigging

features.title: Built for Production
features.desc: Profiles tuned for real-world gigs — skills, gear, certs, rates, availability.

features.title: Bilingual by Design
features.desc: English / Español across listings, messages and briefs.

features.title: Faster Hiring
features.desc: Shortlists, templated intros, and smart filters cut time-to-book.

features.title: Trust Signals
features.desc: Verified badges, reviews, references and work history.

sections.lead_desc: Add your profile and start receiving job requests. Connect your calendar and showcase your best work.
